title: experimental-string-processing causing INTERNAL ERROR: Black produced code that is not equivalent to the source
body:
**Describe the bug**
Feeding Black a file containing a string split over several lines can cause an internal error when using experimental-string-processing

**To Reproduce**

1. Take this file<details>
   <summary>File</summary>

   ```py
   (
       "my very long string"
       " that should get formatted"
       " if I'm careful to make sure"
       " it goes over 88 characters which"
       " it has now"
   )
   ```
   </details>
2. Run _Black_ on it with these arguments `--experimental-string-processing`
3. See error

<details>
<summary>Log</summary>

```diff
--- src
+++ dst
@@ -4,10 +4,46 @@
       value=
         Constant(
           kind=
             None,  # NoneType
           value=
-            "my very long string that should get formatted if I'm careful to make sure it goes over 88 characters which it has now",  # str
+            'my very long string',  # str
+        )  # /Constant
+    )  # /Expr
+    Expr(
+      value=
+        Constant(
+          kind=
+            None,  # NoneType
+          value=
+            'that should get formatted',  # str
+        )  # /Constant
+    )  # /Expr
+    Expr(
+      value=
+        Constant(
+          kind=
+            None,  # NoneType
+          value=
+            "if I'm careful to make sure",  # str
+        )  # /Constant
+    )  # /Expr
+    Expr(
+      value=
+        Constant(
+          kind=
+            None,  # NoneType
+          value=
+            'it goes over 88 characters which',  # str
+        )  # /Constant
+    )  # /Expr
+    Expr(
+      value=
+        Constant(
+          kind=
+            None,  # NoneType
+          value=
+            'it has now',  # str
         )  # /Constant
     )  # /Expr
   type_ignores=
 )  # /Module
```
</details>

**Expected behaviour** Black formats the string into two lines as follows:
```py
(
    "my very long string that should get formatted if I'm careful to make sure it "
    "goes over 88 characters which it has now"
)
```

**Environment (please complete the following information):**

- Version: 20.8b2.dev50+g7f75fe3
- OS and Python version: Linux/Python 3.9.0

**Does this bug also happen on master?** Yes
